title: 2013: A Stellar Collection
description: This collection is intended as a tribute to the hard work and tremendous support these authors have given AEC Stellar Publishing, Inc. in our first year of business.The collection includes a short story from each of our first eight authors and, as a bonus,from two key members of our marketing team.Since the stories and writing styles range so widely by genre, each is preceded by a brief note from the author. You can find more about their books in the last few pages.Any proceeds gained from sales of this paperback will be dedicated to continuing to market these great authors and their work.
author: Oliver F. Chase
